venue.name: Tremont Street Playhouse (located downstairs inside Club Pearl)

item.description:
Join us for a fun night out at The Awesome 80's Prom. Half off tickets only $20! Dress up in your best 80's fashions and join the dance party- or just have a few drinks and watch the fun! Dressing up in 80's gear is optional, but recommended!

New York's #1 Interactive show, The Awesome 80s Prom, is now in Boston! The Awesome 80s Prom is a blast-from-the-past party in the style of Tony 'n Tina's Wedding and The Donkey Show set at Wanaget High's Senior Prom... in 1989!

All your favorite characters from your favorite '80s movies are at THE PROM, from the Captain of the Football Team to the Asian Exchange Student, from the Geek to the hottie Head Cheerleader, and they're all competing for Prom King and Queen. And just like on "American Idol", the audience decides who wins, all while moonwalking to retro hits like "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun" and "Wake Me Up Before You Go Go!"

Get your 50% off tickets now at: http://www.bostoneven....

Tremont Street Playhouse is located inside Club Pearl located at 275 Tremont Street, Boston, MA. We will meet downstairs, near the entrance to "the prom".
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet downstairs, near the entrance to "the prom". If need to, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.name: Awesome 80's Prom- Interactive Dance Party, Half Price Tix!
